dict.string: • Eh440 started harmonizing together in 2012. Using just their voices, this Toronto-based acappella group has wow'd audiences across the USA, Canada, and Europe. • On the heels of their award-winning 2014 debut release Turn Me Up, they're starting to record their next full-length project to be dropped in 2016. • Eh440 is a mix of 5 people from 5 very different backgrounds and musical genres. Joe's been a low bass singer his entire life, Luke's an urban beatboxer, Janet identifies as a country/pop singer, Stacey's soul/pop, and Jake likes contemporary vocal / pop music. • Together they form 'an unforgettable combination of crazy beatboxing, sassy rapping, killer harmonies, and fresh, urban, RnB-influenced compositions'. • Breathed a little fire on CBC's Dragons' Den - click here to see if they got burned! • 6X JUNO winner Serena Ryder features on their 2014 debut album • Stingray Music Rising Star Award Winner and Independent Music Awards Acappella Song Winner

• Joined Eh440 in 2017 • Performed with the Arts Club in Vancouver and Stage West in Calgary and Toronto • Provided backing vocals for solo artist and lead vocalist of The Philosopher Kings Jarvis Church • At the age of 6, Tafari found himself on stage opening for a major artist in Toronto, so the stage has always been a part of his life

• Released a CD previous to Eh440, Tied for #1 on Toronto charts, Top 100 in Canada" • Fave celeb she's opened for: Jay Leno • Has a fear of public speaking - insists that public singing and public speaking are not the same thing! • Has an ice cream sundae named after her at Merla Mae Ice Cream Parlour in London, ON

• AKA The Human Record • Performed in commercials for MUCH VIBE • Promotional commercial for MUCH MUSIC with Amanda Marshall • Toured all over, as far as China • Won Toronto Independent Music Award (2008, Best Live Urban category)

• Through her solo career, released her self-titled EP in 2014 • Top 30 finalist on Canadian Idol • Performs in various musical theatre productions, including the National Broadway Tour of Godspell (Canada/US) • Appeared on America's Got Talent

• Released 5 CDs previous to Eh440, has 2 gold records • Sings in CBS movie A Holiday Romance / A Song for the Season, airing annually, starring Andy Griffith & Naomi Judd • With Janet, performs background singing for the PBS cartoon Daniel Tiger's Neighborhood

• Band member 2012-2015 • Released his first EP, "Things I've Sold" in 2007 • Has organized benefit concerts in the past for charities such as The Make A Wish Foundation • Played at fundraisers for Sick Kids hospital and continues his efforts today using music to create both change and awareness • Won Toronto Independent Music Award (2008, Best Blues category)

• Since 18 he has been performing professionally in Theatre, Film/Television, and Vocal performance all across the US & Canada • Played Jesus in National Tour of Godspell (Eh440 makes him turn water into wine after rehearsals) • Can sing higher than most girls • Signature Dance Move: The Jakey Jake
